channel.title: Kharidian.com [474 data] - Bringing back the oldschool RS community
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://kharidian.com/images/kharidian_logo.png[/img] [URL=http://www.kharidian.com/create/index.php][IMG]http://kharidian.com/images/create_button.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.kharidian.com/client/index.php][IMG]http://kharidian.com/images/play_button.png[/img][/URL]
[I]The development or changes will be decided through the community polls, that will be added every week. But nevertheless we keep it oldschool![/I]
[IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/pvp.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/agility.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/cooking.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/crafting1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/crafting2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/crafting3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/crystalkey.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/duelarena.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/farming.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/fishing.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/fletching.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/godwars.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/herblore.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/kalphite.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/lostcity.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/mining.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/mining2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/runecraft1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/runecraft2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/smithing.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/thieving.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/warriorguild.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.kharidian.com/images/screenshots/woodcutting.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Kharidian.com [474 data] - Bringing back the oldschool RS community
item.dc:creator: @Voycon Voycon
item.description:
@Voycon wrote:

Im Gaara:

It’d be pretty sweet if the download was working & not take you to some big long text shit. lol

What is happening should work though?

Read full topic
